SELECT a.id AS web_permission_id, a.need_authorization, a.controller_class, a.controller_method, a.controller_method_params, a.resources_url, a.controller_exist,
b.id AS permission_id, b.sys_name, b.title, b.permission_str, b.resources_type, b.description, b.create_at, b.update_at FROM web_permission a LEFT JOIN permission b ON (a.permission_str = b.permission_str) WHERE b.resources_type=1 AND b.sys_name=#{sysName} AND a.controller_class=#{controllerClass} AND a.controller_method=#{controllerMethod} AND a.controller_method_params=#{controllerMethodParams}
